titleStmt.title: By the Lord Protector. A proclamation declaring His Highness pleasure and command for putting in execution the laws, statutes and ordinances made against Jesuits and priests, and for the speedy conviction of Popish recusants.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to His Highness,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Whitehall the 26th of Aprill, 1655.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
